scripts.build:nsw: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/nsw:/nsw $(DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build -q nsw) && webpack -c nsw/webpack.config.js
scripts.release: npm run release:verify && npm run release:bump_version1 && npm run release:bump_version2 && npm run release:push
scripts.release:verify:
git diff --quiet HEAD || (echo 'Release aborted because there are uncommitted files
' >&2; false)
scripts.release:bump_version1: version=$(semver -i minor ${npm_package_version}) && npm --no-git-tag-version version $version && replace --silent '(sdk-|web#|\.\./)[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+' '$1'$version README.md && npm run clean && npm run build && git add -f dist/sdk.js dist/noise-suppression-worklet.js && git commit -a -m "Prepare release $version" && git tag $version && git tag -f latest
scripts.release:bump_version2: version=$(semver -i minor ${npm_package_version})-SNAPSHOT && npm --no-git-tag-version version $version && npm run clean && git rm dist/sdk.js dist/noise-suppression-worklet.js && git commit -a -m 'Prepare for next development iteration'
